#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long int fastread()
{long long int t=0;
char ch=getchar_unlocked();
while(ch<33)
ch=getchar_unlocked();
while(ch>33)
{t=t*10+ch-'0';
ch=getchar_unlocked();
}
return t;
}
int main()
{
 long long int i,j,k,t,n;
 t=fastread();
 while(t--)
 {
     n=fastread();
     for(i=2,j=1;n!=1;)
     {
         if(n&1)
            j+=i;
         i<<=1;
         n>>=1;
     }
     printf("%lld\n",j);
 }
 return 0;
}
